summary: After completing his military service, Walter Gulick takes a job as a sparring partner at a gym, the owner of which sees potential in Walter as a professional fighter and takes him under his wing.
cast: Elvis Presley|Gig Young|Lola Albright|Joan Blackman|Charles Bronson|David Lewis|Robert Emhardt|Liam Redmond|Judson Pratt|Ned Glass|George Mitchell|Roy Roberts|Michael Dante|Richard Devon|Jeff Morris|Chris Alcaide|Edward Asner|David Cadiente|Mushy Callahan|Albert Cavens|Orlando De La Fuente|Nick Dimitri|Louie Elias|Joe Esposito|Duke Fishman|Frank Gerstle|Seamon Glass|Joe Gray|Harold 'Tommy' Hart|Al Haskell|Jimmie Horan|The Jordanaires|Kip King|Mike Lally|Jimmy Lennon Sr.|George J. title: Piso de lona
